int AES_GCM_ctx_decrypt (  uint8_t *    cin,
uint32_t    clen,
uint8_t *    ain,
uint32_t    alen,
uint8_t *    out,
uint8_t *    tag,
aes_gcm_ctx_t *    aes_ctx
) 
 

AES GCM Decryption + Authentication operation (Multiple calls for same key) This decrypts ciphered input and authenticates the input authentication data.

Parameters:
ain  pointer to auth-only data
alen  size of auth-only data in bytes
cin  pointer to encrypted-text data (to be decrypted)
clen  size of plain-text data in bytes
out  pointer to decrypted data (output)
tag  pointer to 16-byte tag value (output)
aes_ctx  pointer AES-GCM context

int AES_GCM_ctx_encrypt (  uint8_t *    pin,
uint32_t    plen,
uint8_t *    ain,
uint32_t    alen,
uint8_t *    out,
uint8_t *    tag,
aes_gcm_ctx_t *    aes_ctx
) 
 

AES GCM Encryption + Authentication operation (Multiple calls for same key) This encrypts plain input and authenticates the input authentication data.

Parameters:
ain  pointer to auth-only data
alen  size of auth-only data in bytes
pin  pointer to plain-text data (to be encrypted)
plen  size of plain-text data in bytes
out  pointer to encrypted data (output)
tag  pointer to 16-byte tag value (output)
aes_ctx  pointer AES-GCM context

int AES_GCM_decrypt (  uint8_t *    key,
uint32_t    keylen,
uint8_t *    iv,
uint32_t    ivlen,
uint8_t *    ain,
uint32_t    alen,
uint8_t *    cin,
uint32_t    clen,
uint8_t *    out,
uint8_t *    tag
) 
 

AES GCM Decryption + Authentication operation This decrypts ciphered input and authenticates the input authentication data.

One or both of these inputs can be given together.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits (Input)
iv  pointer to "iv" of size "ivlen" bytes (Input)
ivlen  Length of the iv in bytes (Input)
cin  pointer to Ciphered input of size "clen" bytes (Input)
clen  Length of the Ciphered input in bytes (Input)
ain  pointer to Authentication data of size "alen" bytes (Input)
alen  Length of the Authentication data in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Plain output of size "clen" bytes (Output)
tag  Pointer to 16 bytes of generated authentication tag (Output)
Returns:
AES_GCM_SUCCESS (0) AES_GCM_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1) AES_GCM_INVALID_CTX (-2) AES_GCM_IV_NOT_SET (-3) AES_GCM_KEY_NOT_SET (-4)

int AES_GCM_encrypt (  uint8_t *    key,
uint32_t    keylen,
uint8_t *    iv,
uint32_t    ivlen,
uint8_t *    ain,
uint32_t    alen,
uint8_t *    pin,
uint32_t    plen,
uint8_t *    out,
uint8_t *    tag
) 
 

AES GCM Encryption + Authentication operation This encrypts plain input and authenticates the input authentication data.

One or both of these inputs can be given together.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits (Input)
iv  pointer to "iv" of size "ivlen" bytes (Input)
ivlen  Length of the iv in bytes (Input)
ain  pointer to Authentication data of size "alen" bytes (Input)
alen  Length of the Authentication data in bytes (Input)
pin  pointer to Plain input of size "plen" bytes (Input)
plen  Length of the Plain input in bytes (Input)
out  pointer to Ciphered output of size "plen" bytes (Output)
tag  Pointer to 16 bytes of generated authentication tag (Output)
Returns:
AES_GCM_SUCCESS (0) AES_GCM_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1) AES_GCM_INVALID_CTX (-2) AES_GCM_IV_NOT_SET (-3) AES_GCM_KEY_NOT_SET (-4)

int AES_GCM_init_key (  uint8_t *    key,
uint32_t    keylen,
aes_gcm_ctx_t *    aes_ctx
) 
 

AES GCM Initialization of the key.

Parameters:
key  pointer to Key of size keylen bits (Input)
keylen  Length of the key in bits (Input)
aes_ctx  pointer to aes_gcm_ctx_t structure. This is an opaque pointer to the user (Input)
Returns:
AES_GCM_SUCCESS (0) AES_GCM_INVALID_KEYLENGTH (-1)

int AES_GCM_set_iv (  uint8_t *    iv,
uint32_t    ivlen,
aes_gcm_ctx_t *    aes_ctx
) 
 

AES GCM Set the IV.

Parameters:
iv  pointer to "iv" of size "ivlen" bytes (Input)
ivlen  Length of the iv in bytes (Input)
aes_ctx  pointer to aes_gcm_ctx_t structure. This is an opaque pointer to the user (Input)
Returns:
AES_GCM_SUCCESS (0) AES_GCM_INVALID_CTX (-2) AES_GCM_KEY_NOT_SET (-4)
